price: [Remember] when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from clay.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
